member.name: T:Lucene.Net.Analysis.Snowball.SnowballAnalyzer
member.summary:
Filters with , {@link LowerCaseFilter}, and .
Available stemmers are listed in . The name of a stemmer is the part of the class name before "Stemmer", e.g., the stemmer in is named "English".
NOTE: This class uses the same dependent settings as

member.name: T:Lucene.Net.Analysis.Snowball.SnowballFilter
member.summary:
A filter that stems words using a Snowball-generated stemmer.
Available stemmers are listed in . The name of a stemmer is the part of the class name before "Stemmer", e.g., the stemmer in is named "English".

member.summary: Construct the named stemming filter.
